trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de criação num designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um designer visual, quando muda de origem para a vista de estrutura, o código de origem do markup que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo é analisado e uma versão de tempo de criação do controlo é criada na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando voltar a mudar para vista de origem, o controlo de tempo de criação é transferido para o código de origem do markup e editá-lo na marcação de página Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the DetailsViewDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe DetailsViewDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade devolve um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que contém, geralmente, um objeto que é derivado de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>propriedade devolve uma coleção de esquemas para apresentação de formatação de **formatação automática** caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control and the top level <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> templates.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>propriedade devolve um conjunto de grupos de modelo para os campos de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo e de nível superior <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>modelos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade devolve sempre `true`, que indica que o estruturador cria uma cópia temporária do associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo para gerar a marcação de momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de classe DetailsViewDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.DataBind%2A>método vincula associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo a uma origem de dados do momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> at design time.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método devolve a marcação que é utilizada para compor associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o estruturador para ver, editar e estruturar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> associados</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnClick%2A>método é chamado quando uma região da vista de tempo de criação de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> changes.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>método é chamado quando o esquema da origem de dados de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>alterações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove or add additional properties or to shadow properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é utilizado para remover ou adicionar propriedades adicionais ou às propriedades de sombra de volumes de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Design-time editable regions are not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> methods have no functionality.
trans-unit.target: Tempo de criação de regiões editáveis não são suportadas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>métodos não ter nenhuma funcionalidade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework construções internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>classe quando cria associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo ou uma cópia desse controlo na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de estruturador para neste estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado neste estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de automático formatação esquemas para apresentar o **formatação automática** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>É preenchida a partir de um membro com codificação XML de uma classe interna.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> that contains the predefined schemes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Vincula o controlo associado à origem de dados do momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to the design-time data source and calculates the number of pager and automatically generated rows that are required, based on features that are specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: O método DataBind vincula associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlar à origem de dados de tempo de criação e calcula o número de pager e gerado automaticamente linhas que são necessárias, com base nas funcionalidades que são especificadas para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `dataBoundControl` parâmetro representa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo que está associado a este designer ou uma cópia desse controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controlo para vincular a origem de dados do momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é utilizada para compor o controlo associado no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: First, the GetDesignTimeHtml method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to `true`, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Em primeiro lugar, define o método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlar para `true`, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>coleção está vazia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.AutoGenerateRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A> collection of the GetDesignTimeHtml control to an empty <xref:System.String> array if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, define o GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>coleção do controlo GetDesignTimeHtml para vazio <xref:System.String>se não é possível obter o esquema da origem de dados da matriz.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: It refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to be called.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>objeto para forçar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método a chamar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: It then calls the base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, chama o método base para gerar o markup.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém a marcação para compor o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> no momento da concepção.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é utilizada para compor o controlo associado no momento da conceção e preenche uma coleção de regiões estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para gerar a marcação para a composição de tempo de criação do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method also populates `regions` with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml também preenche `regions` com um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>objeto para cada região clicável ou selecionável da composição do momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, a primeira célula em cada linha é selecionável; todas as células nas linhas são clicáveis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> to which to add definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref> ao qual pretende adicionar as definições das regiões do seleccionável e clicáveis na vista de tempo de criação do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém a marcação para compor o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> no momento da concepção.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o conteúdo para uma região editável da vista de tempo de criação do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is not currently available.
trans-unit.target: Esta funcionalidade não está atualmente disponível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> for which to fetch content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> para o qual pretende obter o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo para uma região editável da vista de tempo de criação do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o estruturador para ver, editar e criar o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador chama o método de inicialização quando estiver pronto a utilizar o estruturador para compor o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A inicializar e respectivos métodos base configurar propriedades e configurar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro representa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo que está associado a este designer ou uma cópia desse controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref>, control which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref>, controlar que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a region of the design-time view for the associated control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a região da vista momento da conceção para o controlo associado é clicada.

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O método OnClick guarda o índice de região selecionada e atualiza a marcação que compõe a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo da superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"></xref> that defines the clicked region of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que define a região clicked do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando altera o esquema da origem de dados para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o estruturador está em edição do modelo modo ou um campo está a ser adicionado ou editado, as chamadas de método OnSchemaRefreshed o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>método, o que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo para refletir a alteração da origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the Properties grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado pelo estruturador para remover propriedades de ou adicionar propriedades a apresentar no Properties grelha ou às propriedades de sombra de volumes de controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the `Properties` grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers controlo utilizam métodos derivados o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para funcionar como sombra várias propriedades de controlo com propriedades correspondentes do tempo de criação que implementa o estruturador, e para adicionar propriedades ou remover propriedades do `Properties` grelha.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the PreFilterProperties method sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> property to `false` when the control is in template mode.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlar, os conjuntos de método PreFilterProperties o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>objeto do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A>propriedade `false` quando o controlo está no modo de modelo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Fields%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the `Fields` dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Isto garante que uma coluna que está no modo de modelo não pode ser eliminada utilizando o `Fields` caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementar uma coleção a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linhas de exemplo para o controlo associado a apresentar.

trans-unit.source: The SampleRowCount property always returns the number `2`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SampleRowCount sempre devolve o número `2`.

trans-unit.source: This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Isto faz com que duas ligações de página a ser apresentada na linha pager o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The number of sample rows to show.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas de exemplo para mostrar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o conteúdo para uma região editável da vista de tempo de criação do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The SetEditableDesignerRegionContent method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: O método de SetEditableDesignerRegionContent não tem nenhuma funcionalidade; não são suportadas para regiões editáveis na vista de tempo de criação do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> to update.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> to write to `region`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>escrever `region`.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de grupos de modelo para os campos do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property constructs a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control field (such as header, footer, and pager) in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TemplateGroups constrói um conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>objetos, um para cada campo de dados transformada em modelo e um para cada campo de controlo (como cabeçalho, rodapé e paginação) associada em <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The data field <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements have a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object for each of the predefined row template types.
trans-unit.target: O campo de dados <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>os elementos de ter um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>objeto para cada um dos tipos de modelo de linha predefinido.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The control field <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements contain a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: O campo de controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>elementos conter um único <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> containing an element for each templated field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> que contém um elemento para cada campo transformada em modelo no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy, rather than the actual control associated with the designer, to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se deve utilizar o estruturador de uma cópia temporária, em vez de controlo real associada ao estruturador, para gerar a marcação de momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade UsePreviewControl sempre `true`, utiliza o estruturador um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que contém uma cópia do associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo para gerar a marcação de momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo não afeta quaisquer persistência para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control itself to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para devolver `false`, o estruturador irá utilizar associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlo para gerar a marcação de momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
